column1: The Purple Pig////The Purple Pig is a very happening foodie hub
column2: set in an intimate dining layout. You share food in a tapas/small plate style
column3: so come with a few friends and prepare for foodgasms and endless flowing wine (that you can all chip in for). Make sure to come early and grab your seats
column4: since there are no reservations! We waited 45 minutes before they opened up a table. You'll probably be sharing a table so if you're not a conversationalist .. position yourself elsewhere.
